about_the_game:
Extend your detective investigation in the world of "Unsolved Case: The Scarlet Hyacinth" with this thrilling DLC that brings more challenges and mysteries to solve and hidden objects to find! Discover new locations, unravel additional case files about the characters, and unlock secrets that could turn the entire case around. It's a must have for players who love puzzles, hidden objects, and mind-bending brain teasers!

This additional content includes four new locations! You'll have to explore the attic floor and find more information about the case in the video archive, which definitely has the information you need! Also visit the development room and Xavier's office!

Gain exclusive access to various unexplored areas. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

🔍 VISIT THE TOP FLOOR!
There's definitely something personal to be found in this room, in addition to the workroom! It's up to you to figure it all out by thoroughly exploring the attic floor.

🔍 EXPLORE THE VIDEO ARCHIVE!
Get ready, you'll have to be very careful to find the necessary thing among the piles of case files and video materials! Maybe it's the video archive that will help you find more information about the criminal case!

🔍 TAKE A LOOK AROUND THE MANIFESTATION ROOM!
Here you can find many entertaining things that hold their own secrets! Solve all the puzzles and find all the hidden items, maybe that's what will help you discover the secrets of Noah Hall!

🔍 SEARCH XAVIER'S STUDY!
Desk, papers, books, folders, and more to search.. It's up to you to pay a visit to Xavier's office and find out what clues the bureau contains!

Challenge yourself to find hidden objects across the new extended location. Each area is filled with detailed and interactive scenes!
